page.title: 07Burscough-Farming Concerns
page.content: A local farming family has expressed concern over several recent trends. Firstly, in a time of surplus production in Europe and U.K., income does not meet the increasing expenses such as fertilizers, chemicals, containers and spare parts. Not enough income means not enough capital in industry to cover overheads (depreciation,rents,rates and running expenses) Secondly we appear to be in a peroid of anti-farming by certian influential bodies, both inside and outside Parliament. Organisations such as Friends of the Earth,Nature Conservancy Council and the Dept of Environment hove all applied pressures which make farming more difficult,such as new rules on chemical spraying and safety at work.
